Label: verbatimIdentification
Definition: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record.

Label: scientificName
Definition: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of a dwc: Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. In the 'Primary hosts' table it refers to the parasite.

Label: other_associatedTaxa
Definition: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers or names of dwc:Taxon records and the associations of this dwc:Occurrence to each of them. All the associations listed here referes to the type 'host'.

Label: bibliographicCitation
Definition: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

Label: identifier
Definition: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
